name: Elemental Mountains
description:
*Game plays best when downloaded*

CONTROLS: WASD or Arrow Keys to move, SPACE for any actions.

You have just recently moved onto an island, and you need to buy furniture to stock your (very empty) new house. Meet the neighbors, climb the elemental mountains, and use the powers of fire and ice to help people out.

This project is a submission for the Level Up Circle: Beginner Jam #1.

(For Windows,  download both the .exe and the .pck files and keep them together in the directory)
